#summary button widget reference

= button widget =
A [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkButton.html GtkButton] containing either a [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkLabel.html GtkLabel], a [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkImage.html GtkImage] or both packed inside a [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkHBox.html GtkHbox]
----
== Definition ==
{{{
<button tag_attr="value" tag_attr="value" ...>
	<label>string</label>
	<variable>varname</variable>
	<height>value</height>
	<width>value</width>
	<input file icon="image"></input>
	<input file stock="gtk-image"></input>
	<input file>filename</input>
	<visible>state</visible>
	<action>procedure</action>
	<action signal="event">procedure</action>
	<action type="function">procedure</action>
</button>
}}}
== Tag Attributes ==
See the [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkButton.html#GtkButton.object-hierarchy GtkButton] widget and ancestor class properties.
=== Custom Attributes ===
None.
== Directives ==
Some of these may have a tag attribute equivalent.
|| *Name* || *Description* || *Contents* || *Mandatory* || *Version* ||
|| label || Button text || || || ||
|| variable || Shell variable name || || || ||
|| height || Scaling dimension || Positive value, -1 to ignore || || 0.7.21 ||
|| width || Scaling dimension || Positive value, -1 to ignore || || 0.7.21 ||
|| input file icon="image" || GTK theme image name || || || ||
|| input file stock="gtk-image" || Stock GTK image name || gtk-about, gtk-add, ... [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/gtk-Stock-Items.html#GTK-STOCK-ABOUT:CAPS (complete list)] || || ||
|| input file || Image filename || || || ||
|| visible || Sensitive state || enabled or disabled || || ||
|| action || Execute command on click || Shell command || || ||
|| action || Perform function on click || function:target_varname || || ||
|| action signal="event" || Execute command on event || Shell command || || ||
|| action signal="event" || Perform function on event || function:target_varname || || ||
|| action type="function" || Perform function on click || target_varname || || ||

== Notes ==
Stock images are hardcoded to GTK_ICON_SIZE_BUTTON and do not scale.
